title: Fill in missing values within groups — fill_by_group
code: data.frame(    var1 = c(NA,2,3,NA),    var2 = c(NA,NA,3,3),    var3 = c(NA,1,3,3),    var4 = c(10,NA, 2,NA),    group = c(1,1,2,2)  ) -> data   fill_by_group(data, group, var1, var3) #> # A tibble: 4 × 5 #>    var1  var2  var3  var4 group #>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1     2    NA     1    10     1 #> 2     2    NA     1    NA     1 #> 3     3     3     3     2     2 #> 4     3     3     3    NA     2

title:

build and reinstall the running package locally. — update_package
